metadata.synopsis:
Zarys is standing on a raised platform just as we stumble into her secret outpost, speaking to us across a gap of about 15 feet. We have to convince her we're friendly or she's ready to have us killed.

Her gang are preparing to burn down their hideout when they leave, and in some cases she'll give the order to start that process if she thinks we're a threat.

31.speaker: Zarys
31.text: Well - it seems you were telling the truth.
31.context: NodeContext: As if she's just remembering something idly - but with a hard edge.

17.speaker: Zarys
17.text: That's the one who saved me, Zarys!

85.speaker: Rugan
85.text: That's the one who saved me, Zarys!

27.speaker: Zarys
27.text: More importantly, that's the one who saved the cargo, Rugan.

124.speaker: Zarys
124.text: You did us a good turn, and the Zhentarim pay their debts.

66.speaker: Zarys
66.text: Seems I recall telling you not to come back without my people.
66.context: NodeContext: As if she's just remembering something idly - but with a hard edge.

95.speaker: Zarys
95.context: NodeContext: Hard edge - she told us to find her agents and we haven't done it yet.

77.speaker: Zarys
77.text: That's far enough. What's your business down here? Answer honestly, and maybe we'll kill you clean.
77.context: NodeContext: Neutral but firm - she's not remotely afraid of us but

103.speaker: Zarys
103.text: Hold on. That's the lass who saved us from the gnolls. Let her in.
103.context: NodeContext: Interjecting - his boss is about to attack us, but he recognises us as the group that saved him

109.speaker: Rugan
109.text: Hold on. That's the one who saved us from the gnolls. Let them in.
109.context: NodeContext: Interjecting - his boss is about to attack us, but he recognises us as the group that saved him

146.speaker: Zarys
146.text: You revealed our location? That tongue gets any looser, Rugan, I'll cut it out.
146.context: NodeContext: Turning to speak to Rugan, who is right beside her. Hard edge - he gave up a secret location to people he didn't even know. When Zarys make threats, there's no bluster, just simple statement of fact.

32.speaker: Zarys
32.text: Come down, then. Seems you're a friend of the family.
32.context: NodeContext: Letting us in, relenting that we helped her gang out but also keen to get back to her own business.

73.speaker: Zarys
73.text: Whoa, hold your arrows! This is Rugan's saviour, I'll bet. He told us all about you.
73.context: NodeContext: Hurriedly belaying her threat, realising who were are and turning suddenly friendly. Unbeknownst to us, an agent of hers gave up our description under torture, and she's luring us into a trap.

143.speaker: Zarys
143.text: Come on in, then. Any friend of Rugan's is a friend of the family.
143.context: NodeContext: Friendly -  she's luring us into a trap.

25.speaker: Zarys
25.text: Your lookout already tried - and failed.
25.context: NodeContext: Almost bored but with a hard edge - we've blundered in and she has more important matters to deal with, just wants rid of us.

34.speaker: Zarys
34.text: Your lookout already tried - and failed.
34.context: NodeContext: Almost bored but with a hard edge - we've blundered in and she has more important matters to deal with, just wants rid of us.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Your lookout already tried - and failed.
76.context: NodeContext: Blunt - we're wasting her time and she's ready to kill us.

145.speaker: Zarys
145.text: I won't. Last time - what's your business here?
145.context: NodeContext: Blunt - we're wasting her time and she's ready to kill us.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Relax - your guard at the door let me in.
50.context: NodeContext: The fact that her guard let us in doesn't move her in the slightest - she's still ready to kill us.

120.speaker: Zarys
120.text: Then your answer decides his fate as well as your own - so make it good.
120.context: NodeContext: The fact that her guard let us in doesn't move her in the slightest - she's still ready to kill us.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: I know the pass-phrase: 'Little serpent, long shadow'.
72.context: NodeContext: Losing patience and dismissing our attempts to use her passphrase - we could have learned that anywhere and it doesn't answer her question.

105.speaker: Zarys
105.text: That just tells me you know our codes, not why you're here. I won't ask again.
105.context: NodeContext: Losing patience and dismissing our attempts to use her passphrase - we could have learned that anywhere and it doesn't answer her question.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Your colleague gave me a pass-phrase: 'Little serpent, long shadow'.
67.context: NodeContext: Losing patience and dismissing our attempts to use her passphrase - we could have learned that anywhere and it doesn't answer her question.

119.speaker: Zarys
119.text: That just tells me you've met my people - not why you're here in their stead.
119.context: NodeContext: Losing patience and dismissing our attempts to use her passphrase - we could have learned that anywhere and it doesn't answer her question.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: I saved them on the road. They'll be along soon.
82.context: NodeContext: To the point - we may be truthful when we say we're a friend, but she's waiting on evidence of it.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: I saved Rugan on the road. He'll be along soon.
46.context: NodeContext: To the point - we may be truthful when we say we're a friend, but she's waiting on evidence of it.

106.speaker: Zarys
106.text: Then I'll welcome you as a friend - if and when they get here.
106.context: NodeContext: To the point - we may be truthful when we say we're a friend, but she's waiting on evidence of it.

127.speaker: Zarys
127.text: Until then, I suggest you keep your distance.

126.speaker: Player
126.context: NodeContext: Reassessing us - we've said the right thing to get inside, but she doesn't trust us and is making the clear.

18.speaker: Zarys
18.text: Hrast. Then you're the least of my problems. Count your blessings - and bugger off.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: They won't be coming back - but I know what became of their cargo.
0.context: NodeContext: Reassessing us - we've said the right thing to get inside, but she doesn't trust us and is making the clear.

90.speaker: Zarys
90.text: Really? That information would be worth quite a bit to me. If you're telling the truth.
90.context: NodeContext: Reassessing us - we've said the right thing to get inside, but she doesn't trust us and is making the clear.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: Fear not, you can trust me. Your friends did.

142.speaker: Player
142.text: Your colleague gave me a pass-phrase: 'Little serpent, long shadow'.
142.context: NodeContext: 'Hrast' is a harsh curse where she comes from - you've just disappeared before her eyes and she's warning her men to get ready for a fight.

40.speaker: Player
40.context: NodeContext: 'Hrast' is a harsh curse where she comes from - you've just disappeared before her eyes and she's warning her men to get ready for a fight.

88.speaker: Zarys
88.text: Hrast - lads, we've got a visitor! Arm the traps!
88.context: NodeContext: 'Hrast' is a harsh curse where she comes from - you've just disappeared before her eyes and she's warning her men to get ready for a fight.

62.speaker: Zarys
62.text: Hrast - lads, we've got a visitor! Arm the traps!
62.context: NodeContext: 'Hrast' is a harsh curse where she comes from - you've just disappeared before her eyes and she's warning her men to get ready for a fight.

129.speaker: Zarys
129.text: Hrast - lads, we've got a visitor! Arm the traps!
129.context: NodeContext: 'Hrast' is a harsh curse where she comes from - you've just disappeared before her eyes and she's warning her men to get ready for a fight.

49.speaker: Zarys
49.text: Hrast - lads, we've got a visitor! Arm yourselves!
49.context: NodeContext: 'Hrast' is a harsh curse where she comes from - you've just disappeared before her eyes and she's warning her men to get ready for a fight.

4.text: You know I can still see you, right?
4.context: NodeContext: As if speaking to an idiot - we just tried and failed to disappear from her review.

112.speaker: Zarys
112.text: You know I can still see you, right?
112.context: NodeContext: As if speaking to an idiot - we just tried and failed to disappear from her review.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: I'm coming in. If you want to die over it, that's your business.
92.context: NodeContext: Reassessing us, mocking but also vaguely impressed that we're ready to fight her and all her men.

61.speaker: Zarys
61.text: Well aren't you a cold one - making threats like you can back 'em up.
61.context: NodeContext: Reassessing us, mocking but also vaguely impressed that we're ready to fight her and all her men.

8.speaker: Zarys
8.text: Well aren't you a cold one - making threats like you can back 'em up.
8.context: NodeContext: Reassessing us, mocking but also vaguely impressed that we're ready to fight her and all her men.

2.speaker: Zarys
2.text: Perhaps you are more useful to me alive.
2.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you had the gall to try and intimidate your way into a base of armed soldiers, and she has a job for someone like that

55.text: Keep coming - see who it is gets buried down here.

35.speaker: Zarys
35.text: Keep coming - see who it is gets buried down here.

137.speaker: Zarys
137.text: Keep coming - see who it is gets buried down here.

70.speaker: Zarys
70.text: Keep coming - see who it is gets buried down here.

100.speaker: Player
100.text: I'm coming in. If you want to die over it, that's your business.

113.speaker: Player
113.text: LET ME IN. OR DIE. CHOOSE.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: I want you to know the face of your killer. Or you can let me in.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: I truly don't want to fight - just to trade.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Try and I will take your skulls as trophies.

97.speaker: Player
97.context: NodeContext: Initally a bit scared, then recovers composure

52.speaker: Zarys
52.context: NodeContext: Initally a bit scared, then recovers composure

138.speaker: Zarys
138.context: NodeContext: Initally a bit scared, then recovers composure

104.context: NodeContext: Slightly bemused at the strange roar

57.speaker: Zarys
57.context: NodeContext: Slightly bemused at the strange roar

15.speaker: Player
15.text: Stand down. I go where I please.
15.context: NodeContext: Blunt, unimpressed - this is her domain.

81.speaker: Zarys
81.context: NodeContext: Blunt, unimpressed - this is her domain.

41.speaker: Zarys
41.context: NodeContext: Blunt, unimpressed - this is her domain.

58.speaker: Zarys
58.text: Still... takes steel to swagger in here. If you're half as tough as you think you are, I might have a job for you.
58.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you had the gall to try and intimidate your way into a base of armed soldiers, and she has a job for someone like that

98.speaker: Player
98.text: I don't want trouble - I just want to trade.
98.context: NodeContext: Unimpressed - our life is in her hands, and she's stating it as a simple matter of fact.

13.speaker: Zarys
13.text: Trade with what? Your life was ours the moment you walked in here.
13.context: NodeContext: Unimpressed - our life is in her hands, and she's stating it as a simple matter of fact.

22.speaker: Zarys
22.text: Trade with what? Your life was ours the moment you walked in here.
22.context: NodeContext: Unimpressed - our life is in her hands, and she's stating it as a simple matter of fact.

75.speaker: Zarys
75.text: But... maybe I'll let you buy it back. I have a job needs doing.
75.context: NodeContext: Considering us - normally she'd kill us but we just tried to talk our way into her base, and she could use skills like that.

148.speaker: Zarys
148.text: We've disarmed the traps. Come down.
148.context: NodeContext: An order, not a request - we're entirely in her power as far as she's concerned.

122.text: I don't feel like trading today.
122.context: NodeContext: Blunt, not to be dissuaded - she has no interest in speaking to us.

74.speaker: Zarys
74.text: I don't feel like trading today.
74.context: NodeContext: Blunt, not to be dissuaded - she has no interest in speaking to us.

16.speaker: Zarys
16.text: I don't feel like trading today.
16.context: NodeContext: Blunt, not to be dissuaded - she has no interest in speaking to us.

84.speaker: Zarys
84.text: I suggest you turn around - we're closing the shop for the day.
84.context: NodeContext: A threat under the guise of friendly advice.

26.speaker: Narrator
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Zhentarim goes and activates the traps.|

94.speaker: Zarys
94.text: I don't feel like trading today.
94.context: NodeContext: Blunt, not to be dissuaded - she has no interest in speaking to us.

111.speaker: Zarys
111.text: I suggest you turn around - we're closing the shop for the day.
111.context: NodeContext: A threat under the guise of friendly advice.

20.speaker: Player
20.context: NodeContext: Frustrated - she's waiting on her agent and his cargo, We're reading her thoughts here, so can be more angry/concerned than the cool exterior she presents

93.speaker: Zarys
93.text: Where in the hells is Rugan. I need that cargo.
93.context: NodeContext: Frustrated - she's waiting on her agent and his cargo, We're reading her thoughts here, so can be more angry/concerned than the cool exterior she presents

19.speaker: Zarys
19.text: Where in the hells is Rugan. I need that cargo.
19.context: NodeContext: Frustrated - she's waiting on her agent and his cargo, We're reading her thoughts here, so can be more angry/concerned than the cool exterior she presents

117.speaker: Player
117.text: I know what became of Rugan. His cargo, too.
117.context: NodeContext: Initially taken aback but barely missing a beat as she realises you must have cast a spell in her. Chiding with a hard edge.

108.speaker: Zarys
108.text: I never mentioned any cargo, and I don't care for people poking around in my head.
108.context: NodeContext: Initially taken aback but barely missing a beat as she realises you must have cast a spell in her. Chiding with a hard edge.

43.speaker: Zarys
43.text: Still, I can look past it - if you have what I need. Come down.
43.context: NodeContext: Shrugging your offence off because she's all about business - but second line is a threat. Her mercy is conditional on your usefulness.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: I'm here to help you find your missing cargo.
29.context: NodeContext: Initially taken aback but barely missing a beat as she realises you must have cast a spell in her. Chiding with a hard edge.

133.speaker: Zarys
133.text: I never mentioned any cargo, and I don't care for people poking around in my head.
133.context: NodeContext: Initially taken aback but barely missing a beat as she realises you must have cast a spell in her. Chiding with a hard edge.

89.speaker: Zarys
89.text: Though it was subtly done, I'll grant you that. Maybe I can use you.
89.context: NodeContext: Grudging respect, reassessing you and your usefulness

110.context: NodeContext: Irritated beyond disbelief that you'd try and read her thoughts - ready to kill you.

134.speaker: Zarys
134.context: NodeContext: Irritated beyond disbelief that you'd try and read her thoughts - ready to kill you.

60.speaker: Zarys
60.text: Here's a thought for you - turn around.
60.context: NodeContext: She caught us trying to read her mind and is giving us a last warning

71.speaker: Zarys
71.text: Here's a thought for you - turn around.
71.context: NodeContext: She caught us trying to read her mind and is giving us a last warning

144.speaker: Player
144.text: I've a network of dangerous contacts who know I'm here. Kill me, they come for you.
144.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you've told her you're from a famed and savage warrior race, and she's not interested in having that kind of chaos around

80.speaker: Player
80.text: A child of Gith goes where they please.
80.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you've told her you're from a famed and savage warrior race, and she's not interested in having that kind of chaos around

125.text: I've heard stories about your kind. Stay where you are.
125.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you've told her you're from a famed and savage warrior race, and she's not interested in having that kind of chaos around

78.speaker: Zarys
78.text: I've heard stories about your kind. Stay where you are.
78.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you've told her you're from a famed and savage warrior race, and she's not interested in having that kind of chaos around

38.speaker: Zarys
38.text: I've heard stories about your kind. Stay where you are.
38.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you've told her you're from a famed and savage warrior race, and she's not interested in having that kind of chaos around

39.speaker: Zarys
39.text: If breathing pleases you, you'd best turn around.
39.context: NodeContext: She's absolutely disinterested in what 'pleases' you - she wants you out.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: A child of Gith goes where they please.
51.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you're a famed warrior race that she thought a myth until this very moment. Vaguely surprised, but only vaguely - she's unflappable

54.speaker: Zarys
54.text: A planeswalker? I've heard stories about your kind.
54.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you're a famed warrior race that she thought a myth until this very moment. Vaguely surprised, but only vaguely - she's unflappable

10.speaker: Zarys
10.text: A planeswalker? I've heard stories about your kind.
10.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you're a famed warrior race that she thought a myth until this very moment. Vaguely surprised, but only vaguely - she's unflappable

7.speaker: Zarys
7.text: If half of them are true, you might be more useful alive.
7.context: NodeContext: She's heard legends of your race and their fighting ability, and is immediately thinking on how she can use you

83.text: You're ugly enough - no need to be a liar on top. Now toddle off back to whatever hole you came from.
83.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you've told her you're from a famed and savage warrior race, and she's not interested in having that kind of chaos around

23.speaker: Zarys
23.text: You're ugly enough - no need to be a liar on top. Now toddle off back to whatever hole you came from.
23.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you've told her you're from a famed and savage warrior race, and she's not interested in having that kind of chaos around

114.speaker: Zarys
114.text: You're ugly enough - no need to be a liar on top. Now toddle off back to whatever hole you came from.
114.context: NodeContext: Considering you - you've told her you're from a famed and savage warrior race, and she's not interested in having that kind of chaos around

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I thought the Zhentarim would honour a fellow Banite.

115.speaker: Zarys
115.text: You're a priest of the Black Hand?

87.speaker: Zarys
87.text: 'Fellow Banite' might be a bit strong, but you're welcome among the Zhent.
87.context: NodeContext: She's alluding to the religious roots your organisations share, but hers have left behind. Still respectul/

121.speaker: Zarys
121.text: Might be I have use for someone with your skills.
